name: The Shrine's Sacred Shade
description: After your Yae Miko, who has this card equipped, destroys a Sesshou Sakura through Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin, the next use of Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura this Round will cost 2 less Elemental Dice.
